scripts.clean-all: rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist; npm run clean --prefix ./client; npm run clean --prefix ./server
scripts.client-build: cross-env INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false SASS_PATH=node_modules GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true npm run build --prefix ./client
scripts.dev: npm run server & npm run client;
scripts.build: npm run client-build; npm run server-build; npm run prod-env
